definition: (formal) to honor with one's presence/to attend
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
we are honored by your presence

sentences.chinese: 洛南试验区欢迎您的光临。

sentences.english: Yunfu Conifer Guest Hotel welcome you to visit.
sentences.chinese: 云浮康年迎宾馆欢迎你的光临。

sentences.english: Some year agos , personal some world which comes me.
sentences.chinese: 若干年前，某个人光临我的世界。

sentences.english: Welcome to the official launch by IBM of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临IBM上海公司的正式开张典礼。

sentences.english: Welcome to Giant store, I can provide with any help?
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临捷安特专卖店，我能为您做些什么？

sentences.english: Welcome to this scenic place, where you'll find an endless enjoyment for your holiday.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临风韵之境，给您的假日增添无穷乐趣。

sentences.english: Many great people will be gracing the opening night of the play.
sentences.chinese: 许多重要人物的光临将为此剧的首演增色不少。

sentences.english: Welcome to Ouran High School HostClub…
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临樱兰高校男公关部。

sentences.english: Welcome to Shui Mu Nian Hua Bath Club.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临水木年华沐浴休闲俱乐部。

sentences.english: Glad you enjoyed it. Thank you for coming.
sentences.chinese: 你吃得满足，我很兴奋，谢谢你的光临。

sentences.english: You must give me the chance to return your kindness when you visit here。
sentences.chinese: 您光临我处时我定要借机答谢您的盛情。

sentences.english: Welcome to Four Seasons Resort Nevis, West Indies.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临尼维斯四季度假村，西印度群岛。

sentences.english: Hello, Welcome to Zhejiang Commodity Net.
sentences.chinese: 你好，欢迎光临浙商小商品网。

definition: we are honored by your presence
to arrive (esp. of notable person)/to visit (more formal than 光臨|光临[guang1 lin2])
to grace sb with one's presence/your arrival (honorific)/your esteemed presence
to look forward to sth/to wait respectfully
Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling/see also 蓬蓽生光|蓬荜生光[peng2 bi4 sheng1 guang1]
to turn up without being invited/unsolicited
to do sb the honor (of attending etc)/to put in an appearance/to show up
